title: Framework for Unified Single-Cell Analysis
text: Framework Unified Single-Cell Analysis (FUSCA) software package single-cell data analysis developed R. moment, contains two modules: CellRouter, reconstruction complex single-cell trajectories; CellComm, infer intercellular communication networks scRNA-seq data.

code: buildKNN(   object,   assay.type = "RNA",   k = 5,   column.ann,   num.pcs = 20,   sim.type = "jaccard",   filename = "graph_clusters.gml" )  # S4 method for CellRouter buildKNN(   object,   assay.type = "RNA",   k = 5,   column.ann,   num.pcs = 20,   sim.type = "jaccard",   filename = "graph_clusters.gml" )

title: Build kNN graph. ‚Äî buildKNN
text: object CellRouter object. assay.type character; type data use. k numeric; number nearest neighbors build k-nearest neighbors graph trajectory reconstruction. column.ann character; column metadata table specifying transitions identified. example, 'population' provided, transitions identified clusters previously identified. However, sorted cell populations customized states can also used. Check tutorials detailed examples. num.pcs numeric; number principal components define space kNN graph identified. example, num.pcs = 10, kNN graph created 10-dimensional PCA space. sim.type character; updates kNN graph encode cell-cell similarities using jaccard invlog methods. filename character; name gml file containing kNN graph.

title: Build kNN graph. ‚Äî buildKNN

FALSE never includes, TRUE always includes. can also named logical vector finely select aesthetics display. inherit.aes FALSE, overrides default aesthetics, rather combining . useful helper functions define data aesthetics inherit behaviour default plot specification, e.g. borders(). prop numeric; proportion points included bag (default 0.5). alpha numeric; transparency (0 1). ... arguments passed layer(). often aesthetics, used set aesthetic fixed value, like colour = "red" size = 3. may also parameters paired geom/stat.
